---
title: "Regression Discontinuity"
author: "Rithika Rao Dodda"
---

::: {.cell hash='10_rdd_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_cb9f18ee816e527354cd51ed1a21299f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(dplyr)
library(ggdag)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'ggdag'
#>

#>

```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(dagitty)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='10_rdd_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_086660abbb28753863d5f2792ad866e4'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Load the file
coupon<- readRDS("Causal_Data_Science_Data/coupon.rds")
# Create a Data Frame
df1=data.frame(coupon)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='10_rdd_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_1c5478101b8e281d5b1da8b1bfac8ca1'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Load the file
shipping<- readRDS("Causal_Data_Science_Data/shipping.rds")
# Create a Data Frame
df2=data.frame(shipping)
```
:::


1. With half the bandwidth

::: {.cell hash='10_rdd_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_99d2c7b0d7c7c321e4f20c95c3ff7817'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Define cut-off
c0 = 60
# Half bandwidth
bw <- c0 + c(-2.5, 2.5)

# Subsets below and above threshold in specified bandwidth
df1_bw_below <- df1 %>% filter(days_since_last >= bw[1] & days_since_last < c0)
df1_bw_above <- df1 %>% filter(days_since_last >= c0 & days_since_last <= bw[2])

df1_bw <- bind_rows(df1_bw_above, df1_bw_below)
dim(df1_bw)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 181   4
```
:::
:::


2.  with double the bandwidth

::: {.cell hash='10_rdd_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_9812c059981553247e6d4fe1ae3bb917'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Define cut-off
c0 = 60
# Double bandwidth
bw <- c0 + c(-10, 10)

# Subsets below and above threshold in specified bandwidth
df1_bw_below <- df1 %>% filter(days_since_last >= bw[1] & days_since_last < c0)
df1_bw_above <- df1 %>% filter(days_since_last >= c0 & days_since_last <= bw[2])

df1_bw <- bind_rows(df1_bw_above, df1_bw_below)
dim(df1_bw)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 629   4
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='10_rdd_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_510c9a1749180bca8ea747c27efb4a55'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Density test
# Check for continuous density along running variable. Manipulations could 
# lead to running variable being "crowded" right after cutoff.
library(rddensity)
rddd <- rddensity(df2$purchase_amount, c = 30)
summary(rddd)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Manipulation testing using local polynomial density estimation.
#> 
#> Number of obs =       6666
#> Model =               unrestricted
#> Kernel =              triangular
#> BW method =           estimated
#> VCE method =          jackknife
#> 
#> c = 30                Left of c           Right of c          
#> Number of obs         3088                3578                
#> Eff. Number of obs    2221                1955                
#> Order est. (p)        2                   2                   
#> Order bias (q)        3                   3                   
#> BW est. (h)           22.909              20.394              
#> 
#> Method                T                   P > |T|             
#> Robust                5.9855              0
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> Warning in summary.CJMrddensity(rddd): There are repeated observations. Point
#> estimates and standard errors have been adjusted. Use option massPoints=FALSE
#> to suppress this feature.
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> P-values of binomial tests (H0: p=0.5).
#> 
#> Window Length / 2          <c     >=c    P>|T|
#> 0.261                      20      26    0.4614
#> 0.522                      41      65    0.0250
#> 0.783                      62     107    0.0007
#> 1.043                      81     136    0.0002
#> 1.304                     100     169    0.0000
#> 1.565                     114     196    0.0000
#> 1.826                     132     227    0.0000
#> 2.087                     156     263    0.0000
#> 2.348                     173     298    0.0000
#> 2.609                     191     331    0.0000
```
:::
:::


3. Using a plot to confirm the argument.

::: {.cell hash='10_rdd_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_f70982e29303a353b1071cc6442c8f75'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Visually check continuity at running variable
rdd_plot <- rdplotdensity(rddd, df2$purchase_amount, plotN = 100)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](10_rdd_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


As they did not overlap, we would have to suspect some kind of manipulation around the cut-off and could not use RDD to obtain valid results.
